input.sentences: my family and i decided to rent a beach house on a tropical island for a summer getaway vacation .
my two younger brothers played on the beach all day long | making sand castles and tumbling in the ocean waves .
of course | i could n't help but take a picture of myself with the ocean -- it was too beautiful not to !
while we played | we saw some local fishermen making their money for the day .
in the middle of the day | we watched a sailing competition start | which was a lot of fun to view .
output.sentences: A family beach vacation is unbeatable.
The kids enjoying sun and surf together.
And Dad taking photos of the occasion before joining the boys in the waves.
Nearby, locals have brought in their catch for the day.
Finally they pull in their boats for the day as the family looks on.
